name: data-card-12
effect: Records the number of times the trainer’s Pokémon have messed up in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer’s Pokémon have messed up in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.black-white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have failed.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have failed.
